thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Boy disappears underwater in quarry
thread.title_full: Boy disappears underwater in quarry | News24

author: news24.com
title: Boy disappears underwater in quarry
text:
Cape Town - A search is under way for a 12-year-old boy who disappeared under water while swimming with friends in a quarry between Deneysville and Oranjeville on Sunday afternoon, the NSRI said.
NSRI Vaal Dam station commander Dick Manten said authorities were activated at 14:30 following reports of a child drowning.
"On arrival, a search commenced for a local [boy] that disappeared under water while swimming with friends in the quarry.
"At this stage no sign of the child has been found and police have opened an investigation. [The] search is continuing," he said.
